spotlights.title: Lifecycle Automation Overhaul
spotlights.problem: Support tickets were climbing as users got lost between purchase and first success. Manual email campaigns weren't scaling.
spotlights.action: Built staged onboarding engine with WP Fusion + CRM integration, mapping user states to targeted nudges and help resources.
spotlights.result: 70% reduction in support tickets, higher activation rates, clearer attribution for what moves users forward.

spotlights.title: Analytics Signal Quality Recovery
spotlights.problem: Multiple dashboards showed different numbers. UTM tagging was inconsistent. Marketing decisions were delayed by data distrust.
spotlights.action: Created event dictionary, GTM templates, strict UTM governance, and server-side events to bypass ad blockers.
spotlights.result: Signal quality improved, modeling became stable, marketing gained confidence in attribution data.

spotlights.title: Edge Performance & Security Stack
spotlights.problem: Traffic spikes caused slow pages and nervous infrastructure. Bot abuse was consuming resources.
spotlights.action: Implemented Cloudflare WAF/Bot rules, optimized cache policies, added rate limiting and performance monitoring.
spotlights.result: 86% cache hit rate, faster TTFB, improved Core Web Vitals, fewer security incidents and downtime.
